content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for my newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the sticking point in the negotiation?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The sticking point in the negotiation was the rental price. I, as the landlord, was looking to rent out my apartment for €1,000 per month, while the potential tenant, Max Müller, was offering up to €900 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Max Müller, as 7.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
